00032 TrLadPar::TrLadPar(const TrLadPar& orig):TObject(orig){
00033   _hwid = orig._hwid;
00034   _gain = orig._gain;
00035   for (int ii=0; ii<16; ii++) _VAgain[ii] = orig._VAgain[ii];
00036   for (int ii=0; ii<4;  ii++) _langaupar_muons[ii] = orig._langaupar_muons[ii];
00037 }

00040 //--------------------------------------------------
00041 void TrLadPar::Clear(){
00042   _filled=0;
00043 
00044   // defaults
00045   _gain = 1.;
00046   for (int ii=0; ii<16; ii++) _VAgain[ii] = 1.;
00047   for (int ii=0; ii<4;  ii++) _langaupar_muons[ii] = 1.;
00048 }

00051 //--------------------------------------------------
00052 void TrLadPar::PrintInfo(int long_format){
00053   TkLadder* lad = TkDBc::Head->FindHwId(_hwid);
00054   if(!lad) {
00055     printf("TrLadPar::PrintInfo() - Error - Can't find the ladder with HwId %4d\n",_hwid);
00056     return;
00057   }
00058   printf("Ladder Name: %s  Filled: %d\n",lad->name,_filled);
00059   printf("Layer: %d Slot: %2d  Side: %d \n", 
00060          lad->GetLayer(),lad->GetSlot(),lad->GetSide()); 
00061   printf("Octant: %d %s Crate: %d TDR:  %2d  PwGroup: %d PwgrupPos: %d\n",
00062          lad->GetOctant(),TkDBc::Head->GetOctName(lad->GetOctant()),
00063          lad->GetCrate(),lad->GetTdr(),
00064          lad->GetPwGroup(),lad->GetPwgroupPos());
00065   if(long_format){
00066   }
00067 }
